in.ac.iitb.cfilt.jhwnl.data
Class IndexWordSet

java.lang.Object
  in.ac.iitb.cfilt.jhwnl.data.IndexWordSet

public class IndexWordSet
extends java.lang.Object

A class to simplify the access to a set of IndexWords, each containing one part of speech of the same word. IndexWordSets are usually created by a call to Dictionary.lookupAllIndexWords.

          Default Constructor.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
It is assumed that IndexWordSets will only be created by calling Dictionary.lookupAllIndexWords, so all IndexWordSets with the same lemma should be equal. Overrides: equals in class java.lang.Object
